00025 using namespace std;

00027 CanaryModel::CanaryModel()
00028   {
00029   std::string model_name_array[12] = {"model0","model2","model01","model12",
00030         "model23","model34","model012","model234","model123","model0123",
00031         "model1234","model01234"};
00032 
00033         model_names.clear();
00034         for (int k=0; k<12; k++) model_names.push_back(model_name_array[k]);
00035 
00036   std::string mstr;  // to help avoid typos
00037 
00038         // now the tedious work of setting up the map
00039         mstr = "model0";
00040         model_map[mstr].push_back(0);
00041 
00042         mstr = "model2";
00043         model_map[mstr].push_back(2);
00044 
00045         mstr = "model01";
00046         model_map[mstr].push_back(0);
00047         model_map[mstr].push_back(1);
00048 
00049         mstr = "model12";
00050         model_map[mstr].push_back(1);
00051         model_map[mstr].push_back(2);
00052 
00053         mstr = "model23";
00054         model_map[mstr].push_back(2);
00055         model_map[mstr].push_back(3);
00056 
00057         mstr = "model34";
00058         model_map[mstr].push_back(3);
00059         model_map[mstr].push_back(4);
00060 
00061         mstr = "model012";
00062         model_map[mstr].push_back(0);
00063         model_map[mstr].push_back(1);
00064         model_map[mstr].push_back(2);
00065 
00066         mstr = "model234";
00067         model_map[mstr].push_back(2);
00068         model_map[mstr].push_back(3);
00069         model_map[mstr].push_back(4);
00070 
00071         mstr = "model123";
00072         model_map[mstr].push_back(1);
00073         model_map[mstr].push_back(2);
00074         model_map[mstr].push_back(3);
00075 
00076         mstr = "model0123";
00077         model_map[mstr].push_back(0);
00078         model_map[mstr].push_back(1);
00079         model_map[mstr].push_back(2);
00080         model_map[mstr].push_back(3);
00081 
00082         mstr = "model1234";
00083         model_map[mstr].push_back(1);
00084         model_map[mstr].push_back(2);
00085         model_map[mstr].push_back(3);
00086         model_map[mstr].push_back(4);
00087 
00088         mstr = "model01234";
00089         model_map[mstr].push_back(0);
00090         model_map[mstr].push_back(1);
00091         model_map[mstr].push_back(2);
00092         model_map[mstr].push_back(3);
00093         model_map[mstr].push_back(4);
00094         }

00096 
00097 void CanaryModel::erase(std::string model)
00098         {
00099   for (std::vector<std::string>::iterator iter = model_names.begin();
00100                         iter != model_names.end(); iter++)
00101                 {
00102                 if (*iter== model)
00103                         {
00104                         model_map.erase(*iter);
00105                         model_names.erase(iter);
00106                         return;
00107                         }
00108                 }
00109 
00110         return;
00111         }
